content: if you re looking for a sweet gift for a loved one these spring starlight sandals are perfect these little shoes feature the beautiful star stitch and a cute button to compliment made from a cotton blend the sandals come in four sizes - 0-3 months - 3-6 months - 6-9 months - 9-12 months specific dimensions for each sandal is provided on the pattern you can use any type of yarn for this project as long as the soles measure the specific length and width i have used a combination of cotton and bamboo yarns and they worked perfectly as well both shoes left and right are worked the same around the toe and heel with a light variation for the left shoe the pattern includes a video tutorial for the foundation double_crochet fdc and star stitch strap both of these stitches are available via youtube links in pattern there are also photo tutorials provided on the first few pages of the pattern don t forget to share your creations as i d love to see them
